scripts.test:every: npm run test:bug:my-app:ext && npm run test:bug:core:ext && npm run test:bug:shared:ext && npm run test:bug:hyphen:ext && npm run test:bug:complexe:ext && npm run test:bug:complexe2:ext && npm run test:bug:likeme:ext
scripts.test:bug:my-app:ext: echo "test without special characters and with file extension" && jest --findRelatedTests src/my-app.ts
scripts.test:bug:core:ext: echo "test with special character and core word and with file extension" && jest --findRelatedTests src/@core/my-lib.ts
scripts.test:bug:shared:ext: echo "test with special character and shared word and with file extension" && jest --findRelatedTests src/@shared/my-lib.ts
scripts.test:bug:hyphen:ext: echo "test with special character and hyphen and with file extension" && jest --findRelatedTests src/@name-with-hyphen/my-lib.ts
scripts.test:bug:complexe:ext: echo "test with special characters and with file extension" && jest --findRelatedTests src/@$_(ok)/my-lib.ts
scripts.test:bug:complexe2:ext: echo "test with special characters 2 and with file extension" && jest --findRelatedTests src/@_(ok)/my-lib.ts
scripts.test:bug:likeme:ext: echo "test with long path like in my app and with file extension" && jest --findRelatedTests src/app/@core/store/store.ts
